bayStackMulticastFloodingMib.name: bayStackMulticastFloodingMib

revisions.description: v4: Added IMPLIED to index of bsmfAllowedInetAddressTable.
v3: Added support for multicast IP addresses.

bayStackMulticastFloodingMib.description: BayStack Multicast Flooding MIB Copyright 2003 Nortel Networks, Inc. All rights reserved. This Bay Networks SNMP Management Information Base Specification (Specification) embodies Bay Networks' confidential and proprietary intellectual property. Bay Networks retains all title and ownership in the Specification, including any revisions. This Specification is supplied 'AS IS,' and Bay Networks makes no warranty, either express or implied, as to the use, operation, condition, or performance of the Specification.

bsmfMulticastFloodingEnabled.name: bsmfMulticastFloodingEnabled
bsmfMulticastFloodingEnabled.description: This object indicates whether filtering of multicast MAC addresses to be flooded is enabled. If the value of this object is false(2), then multicast packets are always flooded to all ports. Otherwise, if the value is true(1), multicast packets that do not match an address in the bsmfAllowedAddressTable are flooded only to IGMP multicast router ports, and multicast packets that do match an address in the bsmfAllowedAddressTable are flooded to all ports.

bsmfAllowedAddressTable.name: bsmfAllowedAddressTable
bsmfAllowedAddressTable.description: This table is used to specify particular multicast MAC addresses that are allowed to be flooded to all ports.

bsmfAllowedAddressMacAddr.name: bsmfAllowedAddressMacAddr
bsmfAllowedAddressMacAddr.description: A MAC address that is allowed to flood all ports.

bsmfAllowedAddressRowStatus.name: bsmfAllowedAddressRowStatus
bsmfAllowedAddressRowStatus.description: This object controls creation and deletion of rows in the table.

bsmfAllowedInetAddressTable.name: bsmfAllowedInetAddressTable
bsmfAllowedInetAddressTable.description: This table is used to specify particular multicast IP addresses that are allowed to be flooded to all ports.

bsmfAllowedInetAddressType.name: bsmfAllowedInetAddressType
bsmfAllowedInetAddressType.description: The type of address contained in the corresponding instance of bsmfAllowedInetAddress. Currently, only values of ipv4(1) and ipv6(2) are allowed.

bsmfAllowedInetAddress.name: bsmfAllowedInetAddress
bsmfAllowedInetAddress.description: A multicast IP address that is allowed to flood all ports. Unicast and broadcast addresses are not allowed.

bsmfAllowedInetAddressRowStatus.name: bsmfAllowedInetAddressRowStatus
bsmfAllowedInetAddressRowStatus.description: This object controls creation and deletion of rows in the table.

bsmfVlanTable.name: bsmfVlanTable
bsmfVlanTable.description: This table is used to control per-VLAN whether multicast flooding is enabled.

bsmfVlanMulticastFloodingEnabled.name: bsmfVlanMulticastFloodingEnabled
bsmfVlanMulticastFloodingEnabled.description: This object indicates whether filtering of multicast MAC addresses to be flooded is enabled on a per-vlan basis. If the value of this object is false(2), then multicast packets are always flooded to all ports of a vlan. Otherwise, if the value is true(1), multicast packets that do not match an address in the bsmfVlanAllowedAddressTable are flooded only to IGMP multicast router ports, and multicast packets that do match an address in the bsmfAllowedAddressTable are flooded to all ports.

bsmfVlanAllowedAddressTable.name: bsmfVlanAllowedAddressTable
bsmfVlanAllowedAddressTable.description: This table is used to specify particular multicast MAC addresses that are allowed to be flooded to all ports on a per-vlan basis.

bsmfVlanAllowedAddressMacAddr.name: bsmfVlanAllowedAddressMacAddr
bsmfVlanAllowedAddressMacAddr.description: A MAC address that is allowed to flood all ports.

bsmfVlanAllowedAddressRowStatus.name: bsmfVlanAllowedAddressRowStatus
bsmfVlanAllowedAddressRowStatus.description: This object controls creation and deletion of rows in the table.

bsmfVlanAllowedInetAddressTable.name: bsmfVlanAllowedInetAddressTable
bsmfVlanAllowedInetAddressTable.description: This table is used to specify particular multicast IP addresses that are allowed to be flooded to all ports on a per-vlan basis.

bsmfVlanAllowedInetAddressType.name: bsmfVlanAllowedInetAddressType
bsmfVlanAllowedInetAddressType.description: The type of address contained in the corresponding instance of bsmfVlanAllowedInetAddress. Currently, only values of ipv4(1) and ipv6(2) are allowed.

bsmfVlanAllowedInetAddress.name: bsmfVlanAllowedInetAddress
bsmfVlanAllowedInetAddress.description: A multicast IP address that is allowed to flood all ports. Unicast and broadcast addresses are not allowed.

bsmfVlanAllowedInetAddressRowStatus.name: bsmfVlanAllowedInetAddressRowStatus
bsmfVlanAllowedInetAddressRowStatus.description: This object controls creation and deletion of rows in the table.
